chunks.title: Certificate of Service Requirement
chunks.content: All documents filed with the Court, other than those filed at the commencement of an action, must contain a certificate of service stating the date and manner of service and the names of the persons served.

chunks.title: Electronic Service
chunks.content: Service is complete upon electronic transmission through CM/ECF. The Notice of Electronic Filing constitutes service on Filing Users.

template.title: CERTIFICATE OF SERVICE
template.content:
I hereby certify that on [DATE], a copy of the foregoing [DOCUMENT NAME] was served via the Court's CM/ECF system on all counsel of record.

/s/ [Attorney Name]
[Attorney Name]
